Posts.Content: sallieg wrote: Is it possible to get lymphedema from the saline expansion of a tissue expander?  The last time I got filled, my arm ached terribly and felt heavy for 24hrs, then gradually got better.  I couldn't appreciate any swelling to speak of, but I am supposed to get another saline injection this week and I am nervous.  My expander is place a little to the side so that it is partially in my armpit. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: lymphedema after tissue expansion sallieg sallieg
